from dg_inventory
where userId = #'$userId$'# <% if(!isEmpty(name)){ %> and (name like #'%$name$%'# or description like #'%$name$%'#) <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(type)){ %> and type = #'$type$'# <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(category)){ %> and category = #'$category$'# <% } %>
order by ids desc
select ids,name,wechat,address from dg_customer where userId =? and name like CONCAT('%', ?, '%') or wechat like CONCAT('%', ?, '%')
